00056 class ExponentiallyDistributedStochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel : public AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel

00061 
00067     double mRate;
00068 
00070     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00077     template<class Archive>
00078     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00079     {
00080         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel>(*this);
00081 
00082         // Make sure the RandomNumberGenerator singleton gets saved too
00083         SerializableSingleton<RandomNumberGenerator>* p_wrapper = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->GetSerializationWrapper();
00084         archive & p_wrapper;
00085         archive & mRate;
00086     }
00087 
00088 protected:
00089
